86.eng-name: Limits and Punishments set by Allah (Hudood)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Ali bin Abi Talib:I would not feel sorry for one who dies because of receiving a legal punishment, except the drunk, for if he should die (when being punished), I would give blood money to his family because no fixed punishment has been ordered by Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) for the drunk

chapter.eng-name: Beating with stalks of date-palm leaves and shoes.
